title: Design a URL Shortening Service
description: Create a system that converts long URLs into shorter, more manageable links.

title: Design Twitter
description: Design a simplified version of Twitter focusing on the tweet feed, posting, and following functionality.

title: Design a Rate Limiter
description: Create a system that limits the rate of API requests a user can make.

title: Design Netflix
description: Design a video streaming platform with a focus on content delivery and recommendation systems.

title: Design a Chat Application
description: Create a real-time messaging application supporting one-on-one and group conversations.

title: Design a Distributed File Storage System
description: Design a system like Google Drive or Dropbox for storing and sharing files.

title: Design an Online Bookstore
description: Create an online bookstore like Amazon Kindle.

title: Design a Food Delivery System
description: Create a system for ordering and delivering food like UberEats.

title: Design a Ride-Sharing App
description: Build a system like Uber or Lyft for ride-sharing.

title: Design a Search Engine
description: Design a search engine like Google or Bing.

title: Design a Social Media Platform
description: Design a social media platform like Facebook or Instagram.

title: Design a Video Streaming Service
description: Design a video streaming service like Netflix or Amazon Prime.
